sentences.en: A man in the gangway suddenly stood up to reach for something in the overhead locker.
sentences.cn: 靠通道坐的一名男子突然起身去拿头顶上方行李舱里的什么东西。

sentences.en: Apparently, some asshole put a camera in the locker room.
sentences.cn: 很显然有个混蛋在置物间里放了摄象机.

sentences.en: At the swimming pool I put my clothes in a locker.
sentences.cn: 在游泳池我把衣服锁在小柜里.

sentences.en: First, we must learn to dress in the average beach locker.
sentences.cn: 首先, 我们必须学会在海滩更衣室换衣服.

sentences.en: He moved into the locker room and began to slip out of his scrub suit.
sentences.cn: 他走进更衣室把手术服脱下来.

sentences.en: He went to a locker room for his street clothes, and returned.
sentences.cn: 他走到更衣室去换上自己的便服, 然后又走了回来.

sentences.en: If you don't know where my locker is, you're in over your heads.
sentences.cn: 如果你们不知道我的柜子在那里你们脑袋进水了.

sentences.en: In the postgame locker room, Bryant was still upset.
sentences.cn: 赛后在更衣室里, 科比仍然很郁闷.

sentences.en: It was George who first proposed that we dry clothes in that locker.
sentences.cn: 是乔治首先提议我们把衣服挂在那个储物柜里晾干的。

sentences.en: Luggage locker can be rent at the airport.
sentences.cn: 可在机场租用带锁的行李寄存柜.

sentences.en: Ted was standing at his locker when I asked him.
sentences.cn: 我去问铁德时,他正站在存放衣帽柜前.

sentences.en: The ship and all her crew went to Davy Jones's locker.
sentences.cn: 该船及其全部水手都沉到海底去了.

sentences.en: There's a sail locker under the wheel deck.
sentences.cn: 在甲板的轮子下面有个航行用的小橱柜.

sentences.en: We were in the sail locker, screaming on our knees over the sails.
sentences.cn: 我们进了风帆柜, 慌慌张张地在风帆堆上爬着.

sentences.en: Why don't you just shoot us in the locker room, chief?
sentences.cn: 你怎么不直接在更衣室把我俩给崩了呢上士?

words.tran_cn: 上锁的；不灵活的；下定决心的
锁上；紧闭；紧抱住（lock的过去分词）
柜，箱；上锁的人；有锁的橱柜；锁扣装置；有锁的存物柜

trans.tran_cn: 寄物柜，上锁的人，小橱，冷藏间
trans.tran_en: A locker is a small metal or wooden cabinet with a lock, where you can put your personal possessions, for example in a school, place of work, or sports club
